CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the PCZDTB : PC71BM ratio was 1 : 4 , a smooth morphology was detected , and no fibril domain was observed , just like the PQCDTB , because the self - organization of PCZDTB is lower than that of PQCDTB.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PCZDTB (Poly-β-cyclodextrin)
2. PC71BM (Poly-71-bromomethyl-cyclodextrin)
3. PQCDTB (Poly-quaternary-cyclodextrin)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. PCZDTB (Poly-β-cyclodextrin)
2. PC71BM (Poly-71-bromomethyl-cyclodextrin)

These are the only two entities in the paragraph that refer directly to "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCZDTB |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. PCZDTB (Property Value: ratio of PCZDTB to PC71BM)
2. PC71BM (Property Value: ratio of PC71BM to PCZDTB)
3. PQCDTB (Property Value: self-organization of PQCDTB)

These entities represent the values of certain properties of the entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as their ratio or self-organization level.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. PCZDTB (Property Value: ratio of PCZDTB to PC71BM)
2. PQCDTB (Property Value: self-organization of PQCDTB)

These entities clearly refer to the value of material properties, specifically the ratio of PCZDTB to PC71BM and the self-organization level of PQCDTB.
